news.title: From the California gold rush to Sydney Sweeney: How denim became the most enduring garment in American fashion
news.summary: The American blue jean was created in 1873 by tailor Jacob Davis. Davis patented the design with Levi Strauss, founder of the eponymous denim retailer.

news.title: The regulatory path ahead for a Netflix and Warner Bros. deal could get dicey
news.summary: Netflix's deal to combine its business with WBD's streaming service HBO Max and film studio Warner Bros. is raising regulatory questions. Netflix's deal with HBO Max is also raising questions about how the two companies will work together.

news.title: David Ellison's hunt for WBD made David Zaslav richer — and it may not be over
news.summary: Paramount is considering taking an offer to WBD shareholders, sources said. Paramount thinks its deal has a better chance of gaining regulatory approval than Netflix's.

news.title: Berkshire Hathaway is on track to lag behind the S&P 500 in Buffett's last year as CEO
news.summary: With less than a month to go, Berkshire Hathaway's B shares are behind the S&P in their 2025 race. With dividends included, the S &P's lead is even bigger.

news.title: Trump administration waives $11 million fine for Southwest Airlines' 2022 holiday meltdown
news.summary: The Trump administration said it will forgive the last $11 million of a fine against Southwest Airlines. The fine stems from the carrier's 2022 holiday meltdown.

news.title: ‘She’ll let him live there for free’: My sister wants to buy our impoverished brother’s house. Is that a bad idea?
news.summary: “Her only concern is that it will show up as an asset or rental property on her end,” the lawyer says. “Her Only Concern is That It will Show Up as an Asset or rental Property on Her end.”

news.title: ‘I’m desperately trying to do right by everyone’: I’m giving my son $250K and my daughter 50% of a property. Is that fair?
news.summary: “My son had no financial input into that property,” his father said. “My daughter had no money to spend on that property.”

news.title: Does my friend have a right to her late father’s multimillion-dollar real-estate empire? His widow claims they’re mired in debt.
news.summary: “My friend really wanted to keep her father’s condo, but her mother sold that too — and it broke her heart,” she said.

news.title: ‘It’s expensive feeding and housing a family of 7’: I’m 41 with $46K in credit-card debt. Do I raid my $1.2 million IRAs?
news.summary: “I bring in $7,200 a month from my pension and disability benefits,” he says. “I’m very lucky. I’ve been through a lot.”

news.title: My friend cosigned a loan for a BMW, but the driver defaulted. They’re both on the hook for $5K. What happens now?
news.summary: “The driver thinks he should be compensated $1,500 for the tires he’s still paying for,” the driver said.
